conccurent.refresh

Class GlobalProgressRefresh

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<V>
      • javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
        • conccurent.refresh.GlobalProgressRefresh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Void>, javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Void>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class GlobalProgressRefresh
extends javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Void>
    This class handle the refresh of all FileElement.progress in the list during the processing. update GlobalProgress class and refresh the globalbar in the UI
    Author:
    mesch
